newsitem.title: ROMANIA: World Bank to grant $300 mln credits to Romania.
newsitem.headline: World Bank to grant $300 mln credits to Romania.

text.p: The World Bank is to extend credits worth about $300 million to Romania after agreement was reached on farm reform and social needs in the Balkan country, the Bank's local representative said on Thursday.

Francois Ettori said negotiations completed last week produced an agreement under which the World Bank would provide $250 million under an Agriculture Structural Adjustment Facility and a further $50 million for social needs.
The credits are subject to approval at a meeting next month of the Bank's board.
